content: round k for __t_r__ rnds or until you reach your desired length 8 finishing undo the end of your provisional cast on chain that does not have the knot tied at the end with needle size b pick up each st with your smaller sized needles from back to front as you undo the provisional cast on once you are done you should have two sets of needles attached to live sts at the top and bottom of your knitting turn your knitting inside out so the wrong side purl side is facing out cut a 9 23cm piece of elastic tie the ends together in a simple knot and pull the elastic until the knot no longer stretches out trim the ends work the elastic over one set of needles so it sits in the middle of the wrong side of the work test the fit by putting your hand in the hole in the middle of the work if it feels too tight or too loose cut a new piece of elastic accordingly now we will begin the kitchener stitch to create a seamless join around the elastic to work the kitchener st 1 cut your yarn at about the length of your forearm and thread it through a tapestry needle 2 adjust/slide sts so they are toward the tips of your needles 3 insert tapesty needle purlwise through the first st on the front needle and leave that st on the needle 4 insert needle knitwise on first st on back needle and leave it on 9 5 insert tapestry needle knitwise 6 insert needle purlwise through the first st on front needle through the next st on the front take the st off the needle needle and leave it on 7 insert needle purlwise on first st of 8 insert needle knitwise on next st back needle and take it off on back needle and leave it on 9 repeat steps 5 through 8 until 2 sts remain 10 repeat steps 5 and 7 once more weave in ends block your scrunchie for best results 10 t h a n k y o u thank you so much
